name: todoist_bulk_scrape_projects
description: Scrape multiple Todoist projects in parallel by their numeric IDs. Use this instead of calling todoist_scrape_project multiple times. Find project IDs from Todoist URLs (e.g. app.todoist.com/app/project/2349078265).

detailSteps.code: const projectName = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="project_name"], [data-testid="project-name"], header [class*="title"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const tasks = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.task_list_item, [data-testid="task"]')).slice(0,30).map(el => ({ title: el.querySelector('.task_content, [data-testid="task-name"]')?.textContent?.trim()||'', due: el.querySelector('.date, time, [class*="due"]')?.textContent?.trim()||'' })).filter(t=>t.title); return { project_name: projectName, tasks }
detailSteps.name: project_tasks
detailSteps.label: Extract tasks
